channel.title: Comments on: The 5 Unique Spins For A Winning Tennis Serve
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Easyladys
item.dc:creator: Easyladys
item.description: The simplest way to win points with this serve is if your opponent puts the ball straight into the net. If they try to hit that serve you can be sure it s going straight into the bottom of the net. That s a point to you without even doing anything.
item.content:encoded: The simplest way to win points with this serve is if your opponent puts the ball straight into the net. If they try to hit that serve you can be sure it s going straight into the bottom of the net. That s a point to you without even doing anything.
